nodes.text: Originating on Naboo, twirrling was the name given to the falconry sport practiced by nobles throughout the galaxy. Participants in the hunt, riding domesticated gualamas, used trained twirrls to seek out and recover prey, which included a variety of small mammals and waterfowl.
One of Naboo's Queens following the rise of the New Republic participated in this activity while utilizing her own private herd.
